thread.title: Going Through Bigg Boss Withdrawals? Here’s What You Can Do
thread.title_full: Going Through Bigg Boss Withdrawals? Here’s What You Can Do

title: Going Through Bigg Boss Withdrawals? Here’s What You Can Do
text:
facebook 160 SHARES 
It's been a week and a half, and we still cannot get over the Bigg Boss hangover. No, seriously. Bigg Boss is the best trashy entertainment show on Television, in recent times. And, of course, we are facing withdrawal syndromes. No drama to read about in the morning, no drama to watch at night and, most importantly, no drama to discuss at work! 
If you are feeling the void, just like us, here's everything that you can do to deal with it. Get the drama back... on Snapchat 
From Bani Judge's London visit, to Nitibha Kaul and Manveer Gurjar's Saturday night plans, everything's on Snapchat. Just follow the contestants that you love, and be a part of their daily drama. Here are some of the IDs you can stalk follow. 
Rewind to season one 
With season 10 coming to an end, now is the time to go back to the first season and get a recap of all the drama that went down this entire decade. Remember Rahul Roy, who took away the trophy? Yeah, we don't either! Find a substitute 
If you love D for Drama, you need to tune into Keeping Up With The Kardashians right now! Or if you want some desi drama, then we suggest going online and binge watching The Khan Sisters - a combination of Gauahaur and Nigaar Khan... best ever. Bigg Boss quizzes 
Since you watched every episode of the show religiously, you can now earn the title of Best Fan Ever. Here's a quiz for you to take . Photo credits: BCCL / Facebook
